edit.cannotChangeOwnerRole: You cannot change the role of an Owner.
edit.cannotChangeSuperadminRole: You cannot change the role of a Super Administrator.
edit.cannotDeactivateOwner: You cannot deactivate the owner of the venue.
edit.memberActive: The member can access the system
edit.memberInactive: The member cannot access the system
edit.newPinSet: A new PIN will be set for the member

roles.adminDesc: Full access to venue settings and team management
roles.managerDesc: Manage staff, shifts, and basic analytics
roles.waiterDesc: Take and manage orders, access menu
roles.kitchenDesc: View and prepare orders from the kitchen
roles.viewerDesc: View-only access to analytics and reports

validation.pinUnavailable: PIN unavailable. Please choose a different one.

invite.invitationSentDesc: An invitation was sent to {{email}}. The invitation expires in 7 days.
invite.messagePlaceholder: Write a welcome message for the new team member...
invite.infoAlert: The guest will receive an email with a link to create their account and join the team. They can log in with their Google account or create a password. The invitation automatically expires in 7 days.

validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address

header.title: Team Members
header.subtitle: Manage your team and invite new members

inviteDialog.title: Invite Team Member
inviteDialog.desc: Send an invitation to a new team member to join your venue

cards.pendingInvitationsDesc: These invitations are awaiting response. They expire automatically after 7 days.

dialogs.editMemberDesc: Update the role and settings for {{firstName}} {{lastName}}.
dialogs.removeDesc: Are you sure you want to remove {{firstName}} {{lastName}} from the team? This action cannot be undone and the member will lose access to the dashboard.

toasts.memberRemovedDesc: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has been removed from the team.
toasts.memberRemoveErrorDesc: Could not remove the team member.
toasts.invitationCancelledDesc: The invitation to {{email}} has been cancelled.
toasts.invitationResentDesc: A new invitation was sent to {{email}}.

performance.title: Performance Metrics
performance.desc: Detailed statistics of the member's performance

errors.memberNotFoundDesc: The requested team member could not be found.
errors.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to view this team member.
